casebody.data:
LANDMARK DEVELOPMENT GROUP, LLC, et al.
v.
WATER AND SEWER COMMISSION OF the TOWN OF EAST LYME Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 31, 2018

Roger F. Reynolds, in support of the petition.

Timothy S. Hollister, in opposition.

The petition by the intervening defendants Friends of the Oswegatchie Hills Nature Preserve, Inc., and Save the River-Save the Hills, Inc., for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 184 Conn. App. 303, 194 A.3d 1241 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
